tool_description: Prescreen ACH/check payments to reduce the risk of fraud and returns. This service will process a submitted Routing and Account Number against MicroBilt's database containing positive and negative ACH/check writing history. It will validate the account is open and in good standing while also returning information about critical account and transaction attributes such as account holder name, driver's license number format and more. User credentialing is required for access.
title: ACH and Check Prescreen

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ach-and-check-prescreen.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ach-and-check-prescreen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
